JOB DESCRIPTION: Requirements:           Python, 2 years of experience in developing enterprise applications.          Deep understanding and ability to apply OOP concepts and various design patterns in the code.          Experience in working with Apache AirFlow in Schedule and Workflow          2 years of experience with at least one of the following relational databases; MySQL, PostgreSQL, Mongo DB or MS SQL.          Ability to build modern, responsive and interactive web UIs following HTML, CSS and JavaScript best practices.          Experience developing and consuming RESTful API          Familiarity with source control tool such as Git.          Knowledge of coding standards and best practices.          Basic knowledge of Azure and AWS platforms.          Enjoy and excel at active technical discussion, information-sharing and collaboration.          Strong oral and written communication skills.                Added Advantage:                Experience with one or more of the Javascript frameworks and libraries; ReactJS / Angular JS / Backbone JS / Vue JS.          Experience with TDD (test driven development), continues integration and continues delivery.          Experience in implementing micro-service based applications.          Experience in implementing cloud native applications.          Experience with NoSQL databases.          Experience with TypeScript.          Experience with Node JS and related frameworks.
